title: San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Visitors to the Top San Diego Events in AugustTravelandtourworld.com
text:
San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Visitors to the Top San Diego Events in August Published on : Saturday, August 1, 2015
San Diego Hotels like Declan Suites San Diego welcome the many visitors who come to attend popular August events like the World Bodysurfing Championships or the San Diego Summer Choral Festival. Declan Suites has impressive special offers to welcome those who come for these or other popular San Diego Events.
World Bodysurfing Championships
August 22 through August 23, 2015
Oceanside Pier | 300 The Strand North, Oceanside, CA 92054
The top athletes in the sport will come to the City for this San Diego event. 2015 marks the 39th year for this competition and more than 350 surfers will come to take part in the various events. Spectators will be on hand to cheer on their favorites athletes and to watch as these men and women take to the water and catch some waves.
Taylor Swift Concert
August 29, 2015
PETCO Park | 100 Park Boulevard San Diego, CA 92101
Taylor Swift is popular with fans of all ages, and many of those fans will come from out of town to attend this San Diego Event. Swift will sing her biggest hits like You Belong With Me, I Knew You Were Trouble, and We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together. This Grammy-award winner will be at PETCO Park for 1 night only, so tickets should be reserved well in advance.
San Diego Summer Choral Festival
August 6 through August 9, 2015
St. Andrew by the Sea, Pacific Beach | 1050 Thomas Avenue San Diego, CA 92109
This San Diego event is much more than a chance to see some of the countryâ€™s best choirs. It is also a chance for vocalists and musicians to attend workshops designed to help them improve their technique. Tickets may sell out for this popular event, so those wishing to attend should reserve their spot as soon as possible.
San Diego Spirits Festival
August 22 through August 23, 2015
Port Pavilion Broadway Pier
This is a fun San Diego event that offers lots of great cocktails, food, and music. Some of the best bartenders and the top chefs will be on hand to make sure that every attendee has the opportunity to try some of the best food and drinks that the City has to offer.
